name: parcel-test
description: A test of the parcel bundler for browser and node using pnpm package manager

scripts.node: parcel build src/app/javascript.js -d dist-node/ --detailed-report --log-level 3 --target node --no-minify && node dist-node/javascript.js
scripts.debug: parcel build src/app/javascript.js -d dist-node/ --target node --no-minify && node debug dist-node/javascript.js
scripts.node:typescript: parcel build src/app/typescript.ts -d dist-node/ --detailed-report --log-level 3 --target node --no-minify && node dist-node/typescript.js
scripts.benchmark: parcel build src/benchmark/bench-runner.js -d dist-node/ --detailed-report --log-level 3 --target node --no-minify && node dist-node/bench-runner.js
scripts.esall: parcel build src/lib/esall.js -d dist-node/ --detailed-report --log-level 3 --target node --no-minify && node dist-node/esall.js
scripts.debug:typescript: parcel build src/app/typescript.ts -d dist-node/ --target node --no-minify && node debug dist-node/typescript.js

author: Brent S.A. Cowgill
